channel.title: Spammer = send message
channel.description:
how would i make it, so if a player sends the same message, or an amount of messages in an amount of time, it sends them a message
example:
player1: selling stuff player1: selling stuff player1: selling stuff player1: selling stuff player1: selling stuff system2player1: Try the market section of the forums for selling items with ease! player1: hmmm thats a good idea!

item.title: Spammer = send message
item.dc:creator: @cowbell cowbell
item.description:
@cowbell wrote:

hmm, some clients nowadays have auto talker built into them
and a command called ::talkon ::talkoff i doubt the talkon commands work.
Or use Auto talker

Read full topic

item.title: Spammer = send message
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

how would i make it, so if a player sends the same message, or an amount of messages in an amount of time, it sends them a message

example:

player1: selling stuff
player1: selling stuff
player1: selling stuff
player1: selling stuff
player1: selling stuff
system2player1: Try the market section of the forums for selling items with ease!
player1: hmmm thats a good idea!
